Properties.ProtectedString:
--Made by Luckymaxer
Mouse_Icon = "rbxasset://textures/GunCursor.png" Reloading_Icon = "rbxasset://textures/GunWaitCursor.png"
Tool = script.Parent
Mouse = nil
function UpdateIcon() if Mouse then Mouse.Icon = Tool.Enabled and Mouse_Icon or Reloading_Icon end end
function OnEquipped(ToolMouse) Mouse = ToolMouse UpdateIcon() end
function OnChanged(Property) if Property == "Enabled" then UpdateIcon() end end
Tool.Equipped:connect(OnEquipped) Tool.Changed:connect(OnChanged)

--Made by Luckymaxer
Tool = script.Parent Handle = Tool:WaitForChild("Handle") Mesh = Handle:WaitForChild("Mesh")
Splat = Handle:WaitForChild("Splat")
Players = game:GetService("Players") Debris = game:GetService("Debris")
ReloadTime = 2
Damage = 15
Meshes = { Loaded = "http://www.roblox.com/asset?id=160207972", Unloaded = "http://www.roblox.com/asset?id=160207986" }
Grips = { NormalGrip = CFrame.new(0.125, 1.25, 0, 1, 0, -3.69598024e-006, 0, 1, 0, 3.69598024e-006, 0, 1), ReleaseGrip = CFrame.new(0.125, 1.25, 0, 1, 0, 0, -0, 0.963053524, 0.269310266, 0, -0.269310266, 0.963053524) }
Images = {161216978, 161217003, 161217021, 161217039, 161217056, 161217111, 161217134, 161217163, 161217177, 161217190}
Ammo = Instance.new("Part") Ammo.Name = "Watermelon" Ammo.Material = Enum.Material.Plastic Ammo.Shape = Enum.PartType.Block Ammo.FormFactor = Enum.FormFactor.Custom Ammo.TopSurface = Enum.SurfaceType.Smooth Ammo.BottomSurface = Enum.SurfaceType.Smooth Ammo.Size = Vector3.new(2, 1, 1) AmmoMesh = Instance.new("SpecialMesh") AmmoMesh.MeshType = Enum.MeshType.FileMesh AmmoMesh.MeshId = "http://www.roblox.com/asset?id=160207800" AmmoMesh.TextureId = "http://www.roblox.com/asset?id=160208024" AmmoMesh.Scale = Vector3.new(1, 1, 1) AmmoMesh.Parent = Ammo
function FindCharacterAncestor(Parent) if Parent and Parent ~= game:GetService("Workspace") then local humanoid = Parent:FindFirstChild("Humanoid") if humanoid then return Parent, humanoid else return FindCharacterAncestor(Parent.Parent) end end return nil end
function TagHumanoid(humanoid, player) local Creator_Tag = Instance.new("ObjectValue") Creator_Tag.Name = "creator" Creator_Tag.Value = player Debris:AddItem(Creator_Tag, 2) Creator_Tag.Parent = humanoid end
function UntagHumanoid(humanoid) for i, v in pairs(humanoid:GetChildren()) do if v:IsA("ObjectValue") and v.Name == "creator" then v:Destroy() end end end
function CoverScreen(player) local PlayerGui = player:FindFirstChild("PlayerGui") if PlayerGui then
local ScreenGui = Instance.new("ScreenGui") ScreenGui.Name = "WatermelonSplatter" local MainFrame = Instance.new("Frame") MainFrame.Name = "Splater" MainFrame.Position = UDim2.new(0, 0, 0, 0) MainFrame.Size = UDim2.new(1, 0, 1, 0) MainFrame.BackgroundColor = BrickColor.new(1, 1, 1) MainFrame.Transparency = 1 MainFrame.BorderColor = BrickColor.new(1, 1, 1) MainFrame.Parent = ScreenGui
local s = Instance.new("ImageLabel") local size = ((math.random() * 0.2) + 0.5) s.Size = UDim2.new(size, 0, size, 0) s.Position = UDim2.new((math.random() - (size / 2)), 0, (math.random() - (size / 2)),0) s.SizeConstraint = Enum.SizeConstraint.RelativeXX s.Transparency = 1 s.Image = "http://www.roblox.com/asset/?id=" .. Images[math.random(1, #Images)] s.Parent = MainFrame
Debris:AddItem(s, (5 + (math.random() * 2)))
for i = 1, 20 do local s = Instance.new("ImageLabel") local size = ((math.random() * 0.05) + 0.05) s.Size = UDim2.new(size,0, size, 0) s.Position = UDim2.new((math.random() - (size / 2)), 0, (math.random() - (size / 2)), 0) s.SizeConstraint = Enum.SizeConstraint.RelativeXX s.Transparency = 1 s.Image = "http://www.roblox.com/asset/?id=" .. Images[math.random(1, #Images)] s.Parent = mainFrame Debris:AddItem(s, (3 + (math.random() * 6))) end
Debris:AddItem(ScreenGui, 10)
ScreenGui.Parent = PlayerGui
end end
function Activated() if Tool.Enabled then Tool.Enabled = false Tool.Grip = Grips.ReleaseGrip Mesh.MeshId = Meshes.Unloaded local HandleClone = Handle:Clone() local HandleCloneY = HandleClone:Clone() HandleCloneY.CFrame = HandleCloneY.CFrame * CFrame.Angles(math.rad(90), 0, 0) HandleCloneY.CFrame = HandleCloneY.CFrame - HandleCloneY.CFrame.lookVector * 1 local HandleCloneZ = HandleCloneY:Clone() HandleCloneZ.CFrame = HandleCloneZ.CFrame + HandleClone.CFrame.lookVector * ((HandleClone.Size.Z / 2) + (Ammo.Size.Z / 2)) local HandleCloneX = HandleCloneZ:Clone() HandleCloneX.CFrame = HandleCloneZ.CFrame * CFrame.Angles(0, math.rad(90), 0) local AmmoClone = Ammo:Clone() local BodyForce = Instance.new("BodyForce") BodyForce.force = Vector3.new(0, AmmoClone:GetMass() * 196.20, 0) BodyForce.Parent = AmmoClone local SplatSound = Splat:Clone() SplatSound.Parent = AmmoClone AmmoClone.Touched:connect(function(Hit) if Hit and Hit.Parent and Hit ~= Handle then local character, humanoid = FindCharacterAncestor(Hit.Parent) if character ~= Character then SplatSound:Play() if character and humanoid and humanoid.Health > 0 then UntagHumanoid(humanoid) TagHumanoid(humanoid, Player) humanoid:TakeDamage(Damage) local player = Players:GetPlayerFromCharacter(character) if player then CoverScreen(player) end end local Radius = 2 for i = 1, 50 do local Splatter = Instance.new("Part") Splatter.Name = "WatermelonSplatter" Splatter.BrickColor = BrickColor.new("Really red") Splatter.Material = Enum.Material.Plastic Splatter.Shape = Enum.PartType.Block Splatter.FormFactor = Enum.FormFactor.Custom Splatter.TopSurface = Enum.SurfaceType.Smooth Splatter.BottomSurface = Enum.SurfaceType.Smooth Splatter.Size = Vector3.new(0.2, 0.2, 0.2) Splatter.CanCollide = true local BlockMesh = Instance.new("BlockMesh") BlockMesh.Parent = Splatter Debris:AddItem(Splatter, 2) Splatter.Parent = game:GetService("Workspace") Splatter.CFrame = AmmoClone.CFrame + Vector3.new((math.random(-Radius, Radius) / 10), (math.random(-Radius, Radius) / 10), (math.random(-Radius, Radius) / 10)) Splatter.Velocity = Vector3.new((math.random(-1, 1) * math.random(5, 25)), (math.random(-1, 1) * math.random(5, 25)), (math.random(-1, 1) * math.random(5, 25))) end AmmoClone:Destroy() end end end) Debris:AddItem(BodyForce, 0.375) Debris:AddItem(AmmoClone, 5) AmmoClone.Parent = game:GetService("Workspace") local TargetPoint = Humanoid.TargetPoint AmmoClone.CFrame = HandleCloneX.CFrame AmmoClone.CFrame = CFrame.new(AmmoClone.Position, TargetPoint) AmmoClone.Velocity = CFrame.new(AmmoClone.Position, TargetPoint).lookVector * 75 wait(ReloadTime) Tool.Grip = Grips.NormalGrip Mesh.MeshId = Meshes.Loaded Tool.Enabled = true end end
function Equipped(Mouse) Character = Tool.Parent Player = Players:GetPlayerFromCharacter(Character) Humanoid = Character:FindFirstChild("Humanoid") Torso = Character:FindFirstChild("Torso") if not Character or not Humanoid or not Torso then return end Tool.Grip = Grips.NormalGrip Mesh.MeshId = Meshes.Loaded if not Tool.Enabled then wait(ReloadTime) Tool.Enabled = true end end
function Unequipped()
end
Tool.Activated:connect(Activated) Tool.Equipped:connect(Equipped) Tool.Unequipped:connect(Unequipped)
